'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{lax3}}.

==Background==
Perched at the top of the temple dedicated to Wael, the Oratory contains some of the most prized relics of the Hand Occult.

==Points of interest==
* The Oratory is pretty simple. The lower section served as a combat arena during the confrontation with the forgotten archmage. The chamber to the northeast contains a pedestal that can be activated with [[Bekarna's Depleted Grimoire]] (must be during the night otherwise it will not be able to absorb enough starlight) and the northwestern corner has the stairs leading down to [[The Scriptorium]].

==Loot==
* [[The Mask of the Weyc]]: On the forgotten archmage.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Oratory of Wael, The}}
title: The Oratory of Wael
